STORY: If you hang around a third class hospital, you'll get ill with the sickness everyone else has.
Caveman has to open up his piggy bank to receive treatment for his monstrous carbuncle.
Caveman want to lose weight… but not know how. He sees a lean monkey playing with its crotch. Ah! So that's how I lose weight, and he imitates the monkey.
If you go through women rapidly you will be the object of envy.
Caveman has a scar because he was shot with a silver bullet when he was mistaken for a werewolf.
I picture an exhausted sick caveman snuggling up in a comfy pelt blanket.
The CAVEMAN felt such a pain after his POGO STICK got stuck in his butt.
The doctor puts the cardboard box on his head and throws a dart at a chart to determine his patients' illnesses.
That's the homeless ward of the city. Wolverine lives in a cardboard box there.

ELEMENT: europe; ward; box; sheaf; lack; yawn
STORY: Europe? Yawn… I've been to every ward(country/area)
Stamp-collectors sit and wait on the road to welcome new mail arrivals.

When an American Indian warrior dies, his body is placed on a TABLE inside a TEEPEE, and a ritualistic ceremony is held to encourage his spirit to ASCEND to that big buffalo hunting ground in the sky.
The soldier was dishonorably discharged when his commanding officer saw two pairs of legs sticking out of a teepee designed for just one soldier.
Sick caveman has to sleep in his pup tent. Not the cavebecause to humid and cold but a nice small pup tent in the sun will heal him from his cold.
